title: Overanalysis
text: We have no good choices now.
effecta: xxBURN Effect: Keel is shaken and loses his action for this round.

title: Shoot the Messenger
text: Why the ever loving fuck did you let things get so bad?
effecta: xxBURN: Requirement: Keel is in the same location as Menas.
effectb: Effect: Both Keel and Menas are angry. Keel is unavailable for the rest of the mission.

title: Doubt
text: I'm giving it my best - and it's not enough.
effecta: xxBURN: Effect: Thea is unavailable for the rest of the mission.
effectb: Discard Thea's character card and any attached assets.

title: On the Grift
text: No one appreciates the breath of life like I do.
